first_block.title: Welcome to KiroDues in Barcelona, massage center and naturopathy
first_block.content: The KiroDues center was born thanks to the passion and curiosity of its founders for the art of massage and the different holistic and alternative techniques. Through the fusion of anatomical-physiological, energetic and emotional knowledge allows us to find the most suitable combination for each person and thus get to restore the physical-emotional balance.

second_block.title: Naturopathy and Wellness Treatments in Barcelona

fourth_block.title: Gift CARD
fourth_block.content: Offer someone a unique experience gift, we make special gift cards.Body rituals, wrapping massages, ayurveda treatments, hot stone massage, decontracting treatments ... Contact us and we will advise you

about.title: Who are we
about.text:
KiroDues is a friendly and reliable Team with extensive professional training and experience.

With a Client focused approached we offer you a wide range of high quality treatments at affordable prices.

We would love to introduce you to the wide range of treatments we offer and we are sure you will be able to find what you have been looking for.

The main goal for us at KiroDues is to be able to satisfy the needs of our Clients. Our strenghts are our extensive experience and the attention we pay to our Clients.
about.opinion: They speak about us in the web
